topics.body:
"@Number1pegasus":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54e141d36368725b7c790000#post_54e141d36368725b7c790000
[bq="Number1pegasus"]


"@SeraphimDawn":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54e1413363687251efee0a00#post_54e1413363687251efee0a00
Florida is a lot of things, its either hot and moist, too hot, too wet, too cold, And you rarely got the nice normal not to hot not to cold days. 

Its horrible! [/bq]
And malaria?
In BC, it doesn't even snow much. Just rain after rain, and after... rain... with occasional sunshine and muggy grey cloudy days. But stuff gets well during the summer if you are tolerant to heat. hen back to rain... coupled with thick fog.

And one year we had it super Cold in Summer! Our weather literally does what it wants at some points. I cant keep track really.
